subject: Simsonn purchase 11/28
description_text:
Hello,

I made a purchase of 11/28 but I can’t find any confirmation in my account
or email. It was purchased using this email as well. Is there anyway I
could get some help and or a tracking #?

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Sorry it was actually 11/27 I believe.

Hi Clayton Hamm,  Please provide the order amount so that we can locate your order using the date and amount. By default, we process shipments in order, so please rest assured. During the Black Friday period, there may be slight delays in shipping, and we appreciate your understanding.

The amount is $428.70

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 01:46 service@simsonn.com
So the VAM pro’s have just arrived but no pedals yet

Hi Clayton Hamm,     Your order number is SSN3940. We shipped the items separately: one via SF Express International (SF6047095993636) and the other via FedEx (886669197870). They should arrive very soon.

Hello,

I was tracking the package and noticed it said “shipping exception” so I
called fedex and they told me the address I gave them did not match the one
on the package. Can you confirm the shipping address you have for me?

On Mon, Dec 8, 2025 at 03:48 service@simsonn.com

Hey I’m sorry for the follow up, but fedex is saying it’s being taken back
to Chino California. What’s going on?

I’ve also just called FedEx and they said the package has been returned to
the shipper? What is happening?
